block.p: DERLAN INDUSTRIES, Toronto, named David Williamson, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds Dermot Coughlan, who is retiring.

ESTEE LAUDER COS., New York, named Joellen Bradford, vice president for marketing at Estee Lauder International, to the post of vice president and general manager at its Stila International unit. Also, Claudia Poccia, vice president for retail business development at Estee Lauder U.S.A., was named to the post of vice president for national sales at Stila.
DERLAN INDUSTRIES, Toronto, named David Williamson, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds Dermot Coughlan, who is retiring.

ESTEE LAUDER COS., New York, named Joellen Bradford, vice president for marketing at Estee Lauder International, to the post of vice president and general manager at its Stila International unit. Also, Claudia Poccia, vice president for retail business development at Estee Lauder U.S.A., was named to the post of vice president for national sales at Stila.

KRAFT FOODS, Northfield, Ill., a unit of the Philip Morris Cos., named Daniel W. Butler, vice president for marketing and strategy at the new-meals unit of Kraft, to the new post of executive vice president and chief operating officer at Kraft Canada.
QUALSURE INSURANCE CORP., Sarasota, Fla., named Robert Thomas Savage Jr. president and chief executive. He had been president and chief executive at the Seibels Bruce Group, an investor in QualSure.
